title: gifting system help
body: SO for the gifting system it said that u can give up to 5 rp gifts and 10 other gifts per day. What are these 10 other gifts, because all the gifts that you can give are rp gifts. so where are these 10 others, like can you give ip gifts or what?

replies.body: It's possible to send a variety of gifts in addition to just RP, as Riney suggested.  We have a [Gifting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ) that might present some additional information on how gifting works.  If you have anymore questions, please let us know!
The 5 RP gifts refer to raw RP, not content such as skins, champions or icons. The 10 other gifts refer to content such as skins, champions and the like.
